body_html:
Oh, yeah:

$ grep -r '\.runfiles' *
tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh:    bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/{tensorflow,external} \
tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh:    bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/google \
tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh:    bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/third_party/eigen3 \
tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:  rpaths->push_back("driver/driver_sh.runfiles/third_party/gpus/cuda/lib");
tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:  rpaths->push_back("driver/driver_sh.runfiles/third_party/gpus/cuda/lib64");
tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md:ln -s ../bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/* .

All of these just need to be changed to .runfiles/some_name.

body:
Oh, yeah:

```
$ grep -r '\.runfiles' *
tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh:    bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/{tensorflow,external} \
tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh:    bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/google \
tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh:    bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/third_party/eigen3 \
tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:  rpaths->push_back("driver/driver_sh.runfiles/third_party/gpus/cuda/lib");
tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:  rpaths->push_back("driver/driver_sh.runfiles/third_party/gpus/cuda/lib64");
tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md:ln -s ../bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles/* .
```

All of these just need to be changed to .runfiles/_some_name_.
